articles.title: 5th session of 10th SPA to be convened
articles.content:
5th session of 10th SPA to be convened 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- The presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea published a decree on the convocation of its session on March 15.
 The decree said the fourth session of the 10th Supreme People's Assembly would be convened in Pyongyang on April 5, Juche 90 (2001), according to the article 92 of the DPRK socialist constitution.

Reception given by Russian ambassador
articles.content:
Reception given by Russian ambassador 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Russian ambassador to the DPRK Valery Denisov hosted a reception at the embassy yesterday on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
 Present on invitation were Kim Ryong Mun, vice-minister of foreign trade, and other officials concerned.    
 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Correspondence between families separated in north and south of Korea
articles.content:
Correspondence between families separated in north and south of Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- Correspondence was exchanged between families and relatives separated in the north and south of Korea on March 15, the first ever since national division, according to the agreement of the third round of north-south red cross talks.
 That day Red Cross liaison representatives from the north and the south exchanged letters of 300 members of separated families and relatives each at Panmunjom.

Delegation of Russian Ministry of Railway Transport here
articles.content:
Delegation of Russian Ministry of Railway Transport here 
    Pyongyang, March 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Russian Ministry of Railway Transport led by minister Nikolai Aksenenko arrived here today.
 The delegation was met at the airport by Kim Kwang Su, chief of staff of the Ministry of Railways, and Valery Denisov, ambassador of the Russian Federation to the DPRK.
